editDialog.title: Edit Aircraft Data
editDialog.warning: Changing the ICAO24 address will edit a different aircraft than the selected!

title.reg: The alphanumeric registration code assigned by the country in which the aircraft is registered.
title.callsign: Registered FAA callsign for operator code.
title.squawk: A 4-digit octal code assigned to the aircraft by Air Traffic Control.
title.source: Data source for the reported aircraft data (e.g., ADS-B, MLAT, Other Mode S)
title.altitude: The uncorrected pressure-derived height of the aircraft above mean sea level (based on barometric pressure).
title.altitudeGeom: The height of the aircraft (usually height above the WGS84 ellipsoid and derived from avionics which may by inertial or GNSS/satellite-based).
title.groundSpeed: The speed of the aircraft over the ground.
title.ias: Indicated airspeed (the airspeed read directly from the airspeed indicator on the aircraft)
title.windDir: Computed wind direction relative to aircraft flight path.
title.mach: The ratio of the speed of the aircraft to the speed of sound in the surrounding space.
title.tas: True airspeed (the speed of the aircraft relative to the airmass in which it is flying)
title.vertRate: Rate of climb or descent (derived from barometric altitude).
title.geomRate: Rate of climb or descent (derived from avionics which may by inertial or GNSS/satellite-based).
title.groundTrack: Direction the aircraft is traveling over the ground.
title.trackRate: Rate of turn of the ground track.
title.headingMag: The aircraft's nose heading relative to magnetic north.
title.headingTrue: The aircraft's nose heading relative to true north.
title.distance: Distance of the aircraft from your ADS-B site at its last known position.
title.position: Latitude and longitude coordinates of the aircraft's last known position.
title.messages: The total number of messages received from the aircraft by your ADS-B site.
title.rssi: Indicated signal strength of the signal received by your ADS-B site from the aircraft.
title.seen: The last time your ADS-B site received a message from the aircraft.
title.version: For ADS-B-equipped aircraft, the version of ADS-B to which the aircraft conforms, as reported by the aircraft.
title.navAltitude: The selected altitude in the aircraft's flight management system.
title.navQnh: The altimeter/QNH setting used by the aircraft's navigation systems
title.navModes: The enabled navigation modes as reported by the aircraft (i.e., auto-pilot, Traffic Collision Avoidance System, altitude hold, approach, LNAV approach, and/or VNAV approach).
title.navHeading: The selected heading in the aircraft's flight management system.
title.nacp: Navigation accuracy category of the position (95% bound on positions).
title.sil: Surveillance integrity level (probability of positions lying outside the claimed radius of containment).
title.nacv: Navigation accuracy category of the velocity (95% bound on velocities).
title.nicBaro: Whether the reported pressure altitude has been crosschecked against another source of pressure altitude.
title.rc: Radius of containment. The reported position of the aircraft is expected to be within this distance of the true position, with a failure rate defined by SIL.

settings.hideAircraftNotInView: Hide Aircraft not in map view

error.dataTimeOut: The data from readsb hasn't been updated in a while. Maybe readsb is no longer running?
error.fetchingData: Fetching data failed: {{msg}}. Maybe readsb is no longer running?
error.databaseUpgrade:
Loading database version failed.
No upgrade, using old database.
error.databaseApiFailure: The file APIs are not fully supported in this browser.
error.databaseVersionOlder: Imported database is older than existing version!
error.indexedDatabaseError:
Error opening database!
Your browser may not support indexed database, it's diabled, or you are browsing in private mode.
Firefox:   about:config => dom.indexedDB.enabled => true
